testsuite.name: integration_pdf_retrieval.Portable Document Format extraction and retrieval integration

testcase.classname: integration_pdf_retrieval.Portable Document Format extraction and retrieval integration
testcase.name: Query finds text extracted from a downloaded Portable Document Format
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Query finds text extracted from a downloaded Portable Document Format Given I initialized a corpus at "corpus" ... passed in 0.004s When I ingest the uniform resource locator "https://www.w3.org/WAI/ER/tests/xhtml/testfiles/resources/pdf/dummy.pdf" into corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.095s And I build a "pdf-text" extraction run in corpus "corpus" ... passed in 0.006s And I build a "sqlite-full-text-search" retrieval run in corpus "corpus" using the latest extraction run and config: ... passed in 0.007s | key | value | | chunk_size | 200 | | chunk_overlap | 50 | | snippet_characters | 120 | And I query with the latest run for "Dummy PDF file" and budget: ... passed in 0.003s | key | value | | max_total_items | 5 | | max_total_characters | 10000 | | max_items_per_source | 5 | Then the query evidence includes the last ingested item identifier ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
